name: Island Of Secrets
description:
A small horrorgame, made for the "Scream Seas Game Jam"

The game has been made in less than a week by:

@EylenboschMaxim: Programmimg

@DaanTheDevDude: Art

@stephanjules_: Sound & SFX

Controls:

Walk: WASD

Left Shift: Sprint

Look around: Mouse

Break Glowsticks: E

We imported most of the assets from the Unity's asset store.
